name: Name
creator: Creator

pipeline.commitMsgWithEnter: Please enter the submission message and press the Enter key to search
pipeline.nameRule: Consists of uppercase and lowercase English letters, numbers, underscores, underscores and dots
pipeline.ymlNamePlaceholder: Please enter yml name，such as build.yml
pipeline.commitTriggerTips: Use a commit history to trigger this build
pipeline.buildMsgTips: Custom build message will not affect your commit history.
pipeline.stopDebugTips: You will leave this page after stop debugging sucessfully
pipeline.debugFailDesc: Illegal name for mirroring or other errors
pipeline.debugRunningTips: Go to the current debugging through the portal of pipeline at runtime and the container for debugging is the one used for the current build
pipeline.debugLoadingTitle: If the container can't be activated after one minute you did so, please contact DevOps (customer service from bk-ci)
pipeline.debugLeaveTips: If leave, the data of new edition will be lost
pipeline.reviewTitle: This pipeline is awaiting approval from a maintainer.
pipeline.reviewTips: This run will use the credentials, build machines or other resources under the project. Please check if it can be run.
pipeline.downloadFailTips: You do not have the permission to download components of the pipeline and you cannot download
pipeline.rejectOpinionTips: When reject is selected, approval opinion is required
pipeline.approvalTimeTips: Please approve before this time. If overdued, pipeline status will be set as Stage Success automatically.
pipeline.rejectResult: Reject, and set pipeline status as Stage Success
pipeline.opinionPlaceholder: Please enter review comments, required when rejected
pipeline.requireTips: is require，Please modify and try again
pipeline.gateTips: Gate access requirement is not met. Gatekeeper【( {0} )】's approval is needed.
pipeline.rejectStop: Reject (Set previous stage status as Stage Success)
pipeline.noYamlOrDisable: Pipeline does not exist or dose not have a manual trigger in this branch

exception.tips403: There is no access permission for the project, please join the project first!
exception.tips418: The OAUTH authorization has not been carried out yet, please authorize first!
exception.tips419: CI has not been enabled yet, please enable it first!
exception.tips499: The information of the project is not queried, please modify and try again
exception.tips500: System error, please try again later
exception.tips520: Stream 服务可以在主流的操作系统上持续快速地编译、测试、部署你的服务。

setting.authBy: Authorized by @{0}. When running, it will use {0}'s permission to checkout current repository.
setting.mrNoApproval: No approval required for the project members
setting.mrNoApprovalTips: Project members do not require approval to run pipepines on their pull requests
setting.whiteListTips: Users in the whiteList do not require approval to run pipepines on their pull requests
setting.disableTips: After disable CI, all trigger events will be ignored.
setting.enableTips: Build, test and deploy your code. Continuous delivery of your product faster, easier, with fewer bugs.
setting.crossRepoUseTips: Credential can be referenced across repositories when it's used in template.

ticket.oauthTokenDesc: Oauth Token is generally used in scenarios where the upper platform invokes Stream. The user has authorized the upper platform with Oauth, and the upper platform uses the user authorization to operate when using the Stream service
ticket.oauthTokenPlaceholder: OauthToken is used to pass user authorization information when the upper platform invokes the Stream service
ticket.credentialDesc: The credentials are referenced in YAML by means of the context settings.<key>.xxx, which has a different field name depending on the credential type
ticket.emptyCredentialTips: You can create a new credential
ticket.noCreateCredPermissionTips: You have no permission to [create] credentials in this project. Please apply for permission or try in another project
ticket.credentialIdPlaceholder: It is composed of English letters, numbers or underscores (_), no more than 40 words
ticket.diaplayNamePlaceholder: Composed of Chinese characters, English letters, numbers, hyphens (-), underscores (_) or English periods, no more than 30 characters, only for display
ticket.diaplayNameTips: When referencing credentials through variables in the pipeline, only referencing by name is supported
ticket.passwordDesc: Used for information that needs to be encrypted and saved in the Tencent CI, such as certificate password, encrypted fields in scripts, etc.
ticket.accessTokenDesc: An access token contains security information for this login session. It's used to link with Gitlab-typed code repo
ticket.appIdDesc: Used to set the type of key-value pair for specific key values, such as the user account password to be filled in bugly atom, the api call, etc.
ticket.sshKeyDesc: SSH contains public and private keys, which are used to link SVN-typed code repo. For SSH configuration instructions, please refer to Blue Shield Documentation Center.
ticket.sshKeyPlaceholder: Please enter the corresponding private key for SSH Key, starting with -----BEGIN RSA PRIVATE KEY----- and ending with -----END RSA PRIVATE KEY-----
ticket.sshKeyTokenDesc: Used for linking Git-typed code repo through ssh
ticket.passwordTokenDesc: Used for linking Git-typed code repo through http

agent.emptySelfPoolTips: Agent pools is consisted of one or more Agents
agent.poolNamePlaceholder: Composed of English letters, numbers, and underscores, no more than 64 words
agent.emptyAgentTips: Agent can be yourself development machine, or the compile machine of your team
agent.importAgentTips: Adding a self-hosted agent requires that you download and install the agent.
agent.useAgentTips: # Use this YAML in your piepline file for each job
agent.emptyLinkTitle: Link your first project or group
agent.emptyLinkTips: select projects or groups to share your agents in this pool

nodeInfo.emptyNodeTips: Agent can be yourself development machine, or the compile machine of your team
nodeInfo.noCreateNodePermissionTips: You do not have the [create] access，please switch project or apply for access
nodeInfo.grayscalePublicBeta: Self-Hosted build machine is accessing greyscale public beta
nodeInfo.parallelTaskCountTips: Please enter numbers less than 100， 0 denotes no limitation
nodeInfo.searchNodePlaceholder: Seperate multiple IP by space, click enter to search
nodeInfo.buildMachineLocationTips: Please select the point nearby based on build machine location, this can increase the speed of archiving files and pulling artifact of the build machine, also the stability of build machine can be enhanced.  PS: if you are in Beijing, please select Tianjin.
nodeInfo.referenceStep: Please refer to the following steps
nodeInfo.executeCommandPrompt: Execute the following command on any path (it will be a workspace for all build runs on this agent) of the target machine
nodeInfo.installBuildMachineTips: How to install Agent on Windows
nodeInfo.devCloudApply: If DevCloud is not available，please contact DevOps-helper to apply
